sourcesContent:
Crear una nueva consulta

 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { UserService } from '../../../../../Services/user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-modal-nuevo-consulta', templateUrl: './modal-nuevo-consulta.component.html', styleUrls: ['./modal-nuevo-consulta.component.css'] }) export class ModalNuevoConsultaComponent { protected FechaConsulta: any; protected dato: any; protected mostrar = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient , private UserService: UserService ) { } //METODOS Mostrar(info:any){ this.dato = info; } }
